text: The entertainment industry is mourning Bill Paxton, who died Sunday at the age of 61. Stars like Tom Hanks, Charlize Theron, Jordan Peele, William Shatner, Rob Lowe, Kumail Nanjiani, and Jamie Lee Curtis paid tribute to the late actor — best known for his roles in films like Aliens, Twister, Apollo 13, True Lies, Titanic, and the Golden Globe - nominated HBO series Big Love — on social media soon after the news of his death broke. “ Devastated by the sudden loss of my close friend and one of the finest actors in the business, Bill Paxton.
